#include "client.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../shardmaster/client.h"
namespace janus {

int ShardKvClient::Op(function<int(uint32_t*)> func) {
  uint64_t t1 = Time::now();
  while (true) {
    uint64_t t2 = Time::now();
    if (t2 - t1 > 10000000) {
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    uint32_t ret = 0;
    int r1; 
    r1 = func(&ret);
    if (r1 == ETIMEDOUT || ret == KV_TIMEOUT) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 5;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    if (ret == KV_SUCCESS) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    if (ret == KV_NOTLEADER) {
      leader_idx_ = (leader_idx_+1) % 5;
    }
  }

}

int ShardKvClient::Put(const string& k, const string& v) {

  Log_info("!!! Put At1 ");
  auto shard = Key2Shard(k);
  Log_info("!!! shard: %d", shard);
  auto sm  = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);
  Log_info("!!! At3 ");
  uint32_t ret;
  ShardConfig latest_config;

  Log_info("!!! At4 ");
  
  sm->Query(-1,&ret,&latest_config);
  Log_info("!!! At5 ");

  auto s_grp = latest_config.shard_group_map_;
  uint32_t grp = s_grp[shard];
  Log_info("!!! At6 grp: %d ", grp);
  auto g_svr = latest_config.group_servers_map_;
  Log_info("!!! At7 ");
  auto svrs = g_svr[grp];
  for (int i = 0; i < svrs.size();i++){
    Log_info("svrs[i]: %d", svrs[i]);
  }

    return Op([&](uint32_t *r) -> int
              { return Proxy(svrs[0]).Put(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r); });
}

ShardKvProxy& ShardKvClient::Proxy(siteid_t site_id) {
  verify(commo_);
  auto p = (ShardKvProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(site_id);
  return *p; 
}

int ShardKvClient::Append(const string& k, const string& v) {

  auto shard = Key2Shard(k);


  auto sm  = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);

  uint32_t ret;
  ShardConfig latest_config;
  sm->Query(-1,&ret,&latest_config);

  auto group = latest_config.shard_group_map_[shard];
  auto svr = latest_config.group_servers_map_[group][0];

  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{


    return Proxy(svr).Append(GetNextOpId(), k, v, r);
  });
}

int ShardKvClient::Get(const string& k, string* v) {

  auto shard = Key2Shard(k);


  auto sm  = (ShardMasterProxy*)commo_->rpc_proxies_.at(0);;

  uint32_t ret;
  ShardConfig latest_config;
  sm->Query(-1,&ret,&latest_config);

  auto group = latest_config.shard_group_map_[shard];
  auto svr = latest_config.group_servers_map_[group][0];

  return Op([&](uint32_t* r)->int{
    return Proxy(svr).Get(GetNextOpId(), k, r, v);
  });
}

} // namesapce janus;
